content: these dishcloths are a simple and effective way to create something practical and reusable for your home be kind to our planet with your choice of yarn if you can if you make these in 100% cotton or bamboo they will be completely compostable when they reach the end of their lifespan many companies sell pure cotton or bamboo yarns for very low prices and one ball will usually make 2-3 cloths this pattern is free so that everyone can enjoy making them you are welcome to sell the finished dishcloths too just be kind and let me know that you are doing so - happy knitting
